title: Rahu Transit in the 7th House for Aries Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting your 7th house brings intense focus on partnerships, marriage, business alliances, and public dealings. This phase amplifies attraction toward unconventional, foreign, or influential partners, while also testing commitment and balance. Relationships may feel consuming, strategic, or power-driven, creating both opportunities and confusion. Business partnerships can expand rapidly but require clear agreements. Rahu challenges your ability to maintain equality and transparency, making conscious boundaries essential to avoid manipulation, dependency, or sudden relational instability.

sections.heading: Marriage & Committed Relationships
points: Strong attraction toward unusual or dominant partners
Need for clarity to avoid illusion-based bonds

sections.heading: Business Partnerships
points: Opportunities through foreign or unconventional alliances
Rapid growth potential in joint ventures
Power imbalance may arise in agreements
Legal and ethical clarity is essential

sections.heading: Public Image & Dealings
points: Risk of reputation issues due to partner actions

sections.heading: Balance & Equality
points: Tendency to dominate or be dominated

challenges: Risk of deception or hidden agendas
closing: Rahu in the 7th house intensifies partnerships as mirrors of growth. Conscious balance and transparency turn alliances into lasting support systems.
